flawed_nl_solution:
After paying off the cost of ingredients, Andrew has $400 - $100 = $<<400-100=300>>300
Since half of the money goes to the homeless shelter, the shelter receives $300 / 2 = $<<300/2=150.0>>150.0
After contributing some of his own money, Andrew donates $150.0 + $10 = $<<150.0+10=106.0>>106.0 to the shelter.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 160.0, not 106.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
